name: Filter
description:
A powerful Filter breaks into your workflow!

At the moment, there are almost 50 customizable effects available.


How to use it:

– Select one image or node (depends on the Select fill-image only setting).

– Apply effects.

– Save Image!


— The plugin allows you to edit the applied effects. To do this, you need to apply it to the original fill-image or node.

— The plugin allows you to work with the image of a node (including a slice). To do this, disable the Select fill-image only parameter.
